original_text: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted in me? hope thou in God: for I shall yet praise him for the help of his countenance.
korean_text: 내 영혼아 네가 어찌하여 낙심하며 어찌하여 내 속에서 불안해 하는가 너는 하나님께 소망을 두라 그가 나타나 도우심으로 말미암아 내가 여전히 찬송하리로다

sentences.original_text: Why art thou cast down, O my soul?
and why art thou disquieted in me?
for I shall yet praise him
for the help of his countenance.
